title: Dune.xyz
body:
[Dune.xyz](https://dune.xyz/home) is a community of crypto enthusiasts, analysts, and investors who use the open data available to all via public blockchains to create charts and other analyses to understand what is going on in these systems.

One of the most important differences between blockchain-based systems and traditional web-based systems is that the blockchain has an open data layer. That means that we all control our data when we use a blockchain-based system. But it also means that this shared data layer is available to all to observe, measure, and analyze.

Here are some examples of community-built charts:

The [P\&L of the Maker lending system](https://dune.xyz/queries/17392/55749):

![](https://avc.com/content/uploads/2021/08/Screen-Shot-2021-08-12-at-8.53.11-AM-2048x984.png)

A [time-based comparison of trading volume on the leading AMMs](https://dune.xyz/queries/1847/3261):

![](https://avc.com/content/uploads/2021/08/Screen-Shot-2021-08-12-at-8.54.27-AM-2048x984.png)

What is interesting and different about Dune vs traditional analytics services is that everything is built on open data. There is no proprietary data involved. And this is as much a community (like Reddit or Wikipedia) as an analytics service.

[USV recently participated in a financing for Dune.xyz](https://usv.com/writing/2021/08/dune-analytics) and we plan to start using it to observe and analyze blockchain-based systems that we are involved in and interested in.

It makes sense to me that analytics tools for blockchain-based systems will be open, community-driven, and composable. And that describes Dune.xyz.

title: Announcing Holly+ Auction House with Zora: Submissions open!!!
body:
![Photo by AndreÃÅs ManÃÉoÃÅn](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/11297a63-12dd-4ec1-aca6-456b20bec0eb.png?height=998&width=1500)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/438033d6-2066-4072-b662-8537af786b01.png?height=895&width=601)




I'm excited to announce the Holly+ Zora Auction House! ü™Ñ

https://auction.holly.plus

This site allows anyone to submit artwork made with Holly+ for approval by the Holly+ DAO, a decentralized international group of friends and supporters who steward my digital twin.üë≠

Every season a new call for submissions is made, and approved works [created with Holly+](https://holly.plus) will be minted as 1/1 NFTs on a limited edition custom smart contract. Profits generated from those sales will be split 50% with the contributing artist, with 40% going to the Holly+ DAO Treasury to fund new tools, and 10% going to me for the use of my likeness. üßÆ

Season 1 begins with the auction of the first Holly+ NFTs, two machine learning models, one of my speaking voice, and one of my raw singing voice, minted on a unique custom smart contract. The submission process is now open, and artworks approved by the Holly+ DAO will be minted on the custom contract and auctioned in a few weeks, bringing the genesis contract and season to a close. Once the contract is closed and sale is completed, the DAO will vote on how to use the funds to make new tools for season 2. ü¶æ

This process is both **generative and collaborative**; rather than randomly generating iterations, instead we are using machine learning tools to aid the generation of submissions from people! üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß‚Äçüë¶

Only Holly+ DAO approved submissions from the community will be minted on the genesis smart contract and that will be sealed on the day of final auction in a few weeks. Holly+ DAO may approve 1000, 100, 50 or 5 depending on the quality of submissions. ü™Ñ

We hope to create a virtuous cycle ‚ôæÔ∏è where artists are compensated for their experiments with Holly+, new tools can get funded to allow more artists to experiment, and I receives some compensation for my contribution.

If those NFTs are resold on the secondary market, a 10% royalty will be split 50/40/10 between the original artist, Holly+ DAO and Holly too!

I hope that this model can help challenge the often pessimistic narrative around ‚Äúdeepfakes‚Äù, and encourage more people to become interested in performing works through the identity of others! ü•∏

This technology is exciting and challenging, and rather than concentrating on ways to limit experimentation by artists I would rather find ways for everyone to have fun, get paid for officially approved work, and contribute to more tools being made!

Read more about the Holly+ project https://holly.mirror.xyz/54ds2IiOnvthjGFkokFCoaI4EabytH9xjAYy1irHy94

Submission Guidelines

Holly+DAO will only approve works [created in some significant way with Holly+](https://holly.plus).

Please make sure that you own the work (both audio and visual) that you are submitting! You can read more about the legal terms of your submission here (https://auction.holly.plus/terms)

Holly+ DAO will prioritise the most creative usage of Holly+ in considering what works to approve. Make something crazy! Please upload an audio file as a .wav and an image file as a .jpg. The image file will be mapped to a 3D transparent model of my head to create continuity in this season. üë©‚Äçü¶≤

Any work submitted remains yours to do whatever you like with! You can release it on an album, to streaming, online, whatever! I really appreciate if you credit Holly+ but that is at your discretion.

When submitting a work you are granting Holly+ DAO the right to mint that work as an NFT, and you will receive 50% of the profits from any sale made at auction. If your NFT is sold on the secondary market, you will receive 50% of a 10% royalty.

Have fun y‚Äôall!

ü§ù Holly üíï

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/04836370-0b42-46c1-9b73-c3a00de7d3f1.png?height=496&width=485)

Special thank you to the Zora team for building this together <3
Dain, Ian, Jacob, Latasha, Yana ‚ú®

title: Descent To The Core
body:
***The first batch of songs out of Elektra drop on Monday August 16 at 4:30 PM ET in the [Songcamp Discord](https://discord.com/invite/wHsJD2sTpc) ‚Üí Add Event Reminder [here](https://www.addevent.com/event/XZ8020000)***

You continue on to the fallen city of Edin Prodo, after hearing from Cat & Alpha in [the second Log](https://zora.co/songcamp/4280). It sounds like Cat & Alpha have collected a second Capsule. 

You also learnt of The Prophecy Of The Elektra from Godina, who said they had ‚Äúa vision that brave warriors from a space unknown will appear out of a portal‚Äù. It sounds like that's be referring to us... 

But how are we supposed to save Elektra? And how do we avoid ending up like the fallen warrior we just discovered?

You and the other travellers finally enter the destroyed city gates of Edin Prodo. You can sense that the energy here is different. Night has fallen, and sounds of distant rumbling creep into your ears ‚Äî as if little earthquakes are shaking Elektra some miles away. 

You see something glimmering softly in the distance.. another log device! The third one you've discovered. 

Just like [Log 1](https://zora.co/songcamp/4176) and [Log 2](https://zora.co/songcamp/4280), this one also has a recent message on it - recorded just 34 minutes ago. 

You press play...

[NFT](ethereum://0xabEFBc9fD2F806065b4f3C237d4b59D9A97Bcac7/4435)


Collecting this 1/1 NFT also includes:
* A gift of 1000 $ELEKTRA
* Access to the ELEKTRA interactive web3 game on Discord
* One (1) invitation to Songcamp's Patron House -- a dedicated space for patrons of 1/1 Songcamp NFTs to receive deep + intimate access into the growing Songcamp community and activities.

***Jump into the [Elektra Discord interactive game](https://elektra.camp/#/) to unlock the full audio story of Cat & Alpha as they journey with you through Elektra.***

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/f9a97259-0279-4f2f-b87d-c841ff346c10.png?height=1080&width=1080)

## *Descent To The Core* is the result of collective creation within Songcamp Elektra

Elektra is the second experiment powered by *Songcamp* ‚Äî a web3 community interested in exploring at the edges of where music meets the new internet.

The audio-visual artwork for Log 3 was created by two teams within the Elektra camp ‚Äî the Visual Sqaud and The Swarm. The latter is a team of ~10 musicians creating the script, voiceovers, and sound design for Elektra's story-based pieces. See the contributors below:

[Log 3: Descent To The Core](split://0x365D4069feE4ba2d9CB3331B2b176e0a402cf900?network=mainnet)

### Visual Squad Credits
* **3D Elements**
    * The Busmuth Temple by [JGAP](https://twitter.com/jokersgotaposse)
    * The Green Aurora + glitches by [Porke](https://twitter.com/PorkeDesign)
    * Scene layout, Log creation, final render  + composition by [Metsa](https://twitter.com/madebymetsa)
* **2D Elements**
    * Audio wave form visual by [Ivana](https://twitter.com/ive77i)
    * Elektran Sigils by [Private Woman](https://twitter.com/privatewoman777)
    * Flatfile design by [Peace Node](https://twitter.com/peace_node)

### The Swarm Credits
* **Voice acting**
    * Dartimus voice: [Colt](https://twitter.com/coltontbrown) 
    * Godina voice: [Iara](https://twitter.com/yoda_wazgood) and [Fran](https://twitter.com/thisisfrances)
    * Cat voice: [Jack](https://twitter.com/jackintheway)
    * Alpha voice: [Alex](https://twitter.com/alexpurdymusic)
    * Grey voice: [Greydient](https://twitter.com/greydient_music)
* **Mixing**
    * Mix and Arrangement Master: [Conor](https://twitter.com/ConorDalton_GC)
    * Voice processing and mix arrangement support: [Greydient](https://twitter.com/greydient_music)
    * Mix support: [Max](https://twitter.com/drummaxd), Alex, [Fran](https://twitter.com/thisisfrances)
* **Writing**
    * Head Writer: Iara
    * Creative Directors: [Matthew](https://twitter.com/matthewchaim) and Max
    * Writers: [Sarah](https://twitter.com/sarahgrabman), Jack, Alex, [Will](https://twitter.com/thepmmirror)
* **Music**
    * Godina song: Iara
    * Capsule song: Fran
    * Log 3 NFT ending beat: Max
    * Log 3 cave scene beat: Alex
    * Music bed/ SFX: [Josh](https://twitter.com/JoshLippi), Conor, Iara, Fran, Greydient


**The first batch of songs out of Elektra drop on Monday August 16 at 4:30 PM ET ‚Üí [Add Event Reminder](https://www.addevent.com/event/XZ8020000)**

## Phase 2 of the Elektra project begins in September 2021 ‚Üí The Elektra DAO

**Dates:** Begin to establish during camp, with the first official ElektraDAO call on September 1 2021 
* Establish decentralized influence over the future of Elektra via the $ELEKTRA token
    * Develop Elektra‚Äôs tokenomics design and distribution to incentivize high-quality participation in the project through collective ownership and governance
    * Create a committee of camp participants + backers to continue developing the Elektra project
    * Initial proposed tokenonmics distribution ‚Üí August 9 2021
* Develop and execute on proposals that move the Elektra story, art and project forward
    * **EXPAND** ‚Äî increase the reach and distribution of the story and art we‚Äôve already created. Ideas: 
        * An ELEKTRA album release ‚Äî audio story + songs
        * A re-release of the Elektra interactive game that is gated by $ELEKTRA and/or Portal Tickets
        * Alternative web3 routes to distribution + monetization of the story and artwork
    * **ADVANCE** ‚Äî continue to develop future chapters of the Elektra story and world. Ideas:
        * Write Chapter 2 and onward of the Elektra story
        * Create more audio-visual pieces that tell that story
        * Create more levels to the Elektra interactive game
        * Create more songs for future chapters
        * Create a feature film :)

## Phase 2 of the Elektra project begins in September 2021 ‚Üí The Elektra DAO

**Dates:** Begin to establish during camp, with the first official ElektraDAO call on September 1 2021 
* Establish decentralized influence over the future of Elektra via the $ELEKTRA token
    * Develop Elektra‚Äôs tokenomics design and distribution to incentivize high-quality participation in the project through collective ownership and governance
    * Create a committee of camp participants + backers to continue developing the Elektra project
    * Initial proposed tokenonmics distribution ‚Üí August 9 2021
* Develop and execute on proposals that move the Elektra story, art and project forward
    * **EXPAND** ‚Äî increase the reach and distribution of the story and art we‚Äôve already created. Ideas: 
        * An ELEKTRA album release ‚Äî audio story + songs
        * A re-release of the Elektra interactive game that is gated by $ELEKTRA and/or Portal Tickets
        * Alternative web3 routes to distribution + monetization of the story and artwork
    * **ADVANCE** ‚Äî continue to develop future chapters of the Elektra story and world. Ideas:
        * Write Chapter 2 and onward of the Elektra story
        * Create more audio-visual pieces that tell that story
        * Create more levels to the Elektra interactive game
        * Create more songs for future chapters
        * Create a feature film :)

title: Descent To The Core
body:
***The first batch of songs out of Elektra drop on Monday August 16 at 4:30 PM ET in the [Songcamp Discord](https://discord.com/invite/wHsJD2sTpc) ‚Üí Add Event Reminder [here](https://www.addevent.com/event/XZ8020000)***

You continue on to the fallen city of Edin Prodo, after hearing from Cat & Alpha in [the second Log](https://zora.co/songcamp/4280). It sounds like Cat & Alpha have collected a second Capsule. 

You also learnt of The Prophecy Of The Elektra from Godina, who said they had ‚Äúa vision that brave warriors from a space unknown will appear out of a portal‚Äù. It sounds like that's referring to us... 

But how are we supposed to save Elektra? And how do we avoid ending up like the fallen warrior we just discovered?

You and the other travellers finally enter the destroyed city gates of Edin Prodo. You can sense that the energy here is different. Night has fallen, and sounds of distant rumbling creep into your ears ‚Äî as if little earthquakes are shaking Elektra some miles away. 

You see something glimmering softly in the distance.. another log device! The third one you've discovered. 

Just like [Log 1](https://zora.co/songcamp/4176) and [Log 2](https://zora.co/songcamp/4280), this one also has a recent message on it - recorded just 34 minutes ago. 

You press play...

[NFT](ethereum://0xabEFBc9fD2F806065b4f3C237d4b59D9A97Bcac7/4435)

You can collect this 1/1 NFT by bidding on Zora: https://zora.co/songcamp/4435

Collecting this 1/1 NFT also includes:
* A gift of 1000 $ELEKTRA
* Access to the ELEKTRA interactive web3 game on Discord
* One (1) invitation to Songcamp's Patron House -- a dedicated space for patrons of 1/1 Songcamp NFTs to receive deep + intimate access into the growing Songcamp community and activities.

***Jump into the [Elektra Discord interactive game](https://elektra.camp/#/) to unlock the full audio story of Cat & Alpha as they journey with you through Elektra.***

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/f9a97259-0279-4f2f-b87d-c841ff346c10.png?height=1080&width=1080)

## *Descent To The Core* is the result of collective creation within Songcamp Elektra

Elektra is the second experiment powered by *Songcamp* ‚Äî a web3 community interested in exploring at the edges of where music meets the new internet.

The audio-visual artwork for Log 3 was created by two teams within the Elektra camp ‚Äî the Visual Sqaud and The Swarm. The latter is a team of ~10 musicians creating the script, voiceovers, and sound design for Elektra's story-based pieces. See the contributors below:

[Log 3: Descent To The Core](split://0x365D4069feE4ba2d9CB3331B2b176e0a402cf900?network=mainnet)

### Visual Squad Credits

* **2D Elements**

title: CityDAO July Community Roundup
body:
It has been a jam-packed last few weeks around the CityDAO community. Grab a beverage of your choice and dive in! üçπ ‚òïÔ∏è

### What is CityDAO?

The vision of CityDAO is to build the city of the future on the Ethereum blockchain by tokenizing land, rights, and governance.

See the landing page below for more information.

## üîàNews & Updates

### üî• So...CityDAO is officially registered as an LLC in Wyoming!

![](https://chance.ghost.io/content/images/2021/08/image-4.png)

### üî• We got voted onto Mirror via the $WRITE RACE (as you can see üòâ )!

![](https://chance.ghost.io/content/images/2021/08/image-3.png)

Check us out here:

[CityDAO](https://city.mirror.xyz/)


### üî• We also did our first parcel raise with the First Citizen NFT! ¬†

95% goes towards the purchase of our first parcel, 5% goes to the artist, community member @casey.

HUGE shout-out & congratulations to [Justin Kalland](https://twitter.com/JustinKalland) who purchased the First Citizen NFT. The NFT sold for 6.52 ETH giving us a great first step in our mission to put land on chain! ü•≥

And thanks so much to @casey who created the NFT art üñº - it is glorious.

[Become the First Citizen of CityDAO and name our first city parc‚Ä¶ ‚Äî Mirror](https://city.mirror.xyz/CmZyzy3tuOu4TPUnfsYaR1Zoub1yiej6ZoOEuoayDQM)

### My goodness, that's a whole LOT OF PROGRESS!!! üåÜ üåÉ üèô

![](https://chance.ghost.io/content/images/2021/08/9DKyb3nXKD.gif)

Let's keep the progress rolling!

### Do you want to contribute but currently don't know how?

I want to make sure everyone who wants to contribute can get more involved! If this is you please send me a DM @chance and let me know what you want to work on what skillsets you have.

In the next month we're going to focus on how we can get more community members actively involved to take the CityDAO project to the next level. Also, if you have any ideas on how to best facilitate this, let us know! Feel free to message in one of the public chats or shoot me a DM in Discord. üôè

***

## Shout-outs & showcases

### üî•

Massive shout-out to @casey who has been helping out with the CityDAO community in SO MANY ways, including crafting the Community-Call badges (among other creations):

[](https://twitter.com/acartoonclub/status/1420507410951725056?s=20)

Here's another example:

[#501 - City Watcher - Blitmap | OpenSea](https://opensea.io/assets/0x8d04a8c79ceb0889bdd12acdf3fa9d207ed3ff63/501)

Casey was instrumental in helping us acquire the Night Watch Blitmap as a logo asset for CityDAO. Now the DAO owns it. üòÅ  


### üî•

I recommend checking out this article by @armchairsafari:

[An Alternative Rent-to-Own Housing Model](https://alex-staircase.medium.com/an-alternative-rent-to-own-housing-model-e44dfd241aa9)

### üî•

@build\_\_ is cooking up something super exciting!!

> A global coworking DAO.

Here's the whitepaper (includes discord invite link as well):

[build_whitepaper v0.1 (Open-source commenting enabled)](https://docs.google.com/document/d/17ing2UFnhEN5M3Bzi9gVfNKw4HjQiRwFzW4LdKgPsWE/edit#heading=h.r6hkjb5qlla)


Also as a sidenote, if you ever get the opportunity to chat with @build\_\_ I highly recommend it ‚Äì such intriguing perspectives based on unique experiences. You'll know what I mean when you do it. üòâ

### üî•

Big shout-out to @JonathanHollis and @CreatorCabins for continuing to do awesome things! They literally have buried 1ETH in a treasure chest somewhere in Texas! ü§© 

[](https://twitter.com/CityDao/status/1420777425256861707?s=20)

### üî•

Massive shout-out to @bpetes who has been instrumental in keeping things flowing at CityDAO and takes initiative to help wherever it is needed!

@bpetes is also co-founder of Sobol (leading the way for decentralized and humanistic work).

Check Sobol out here üíé :

[Sobol - The Organizational Accountability Platform](https://sobol.io/)


### üî•

Here is a Mirror post by community member @danconway who wrote "I used amazing energy of CityDAO as an example in my latest Mirror post":

> How do I know what DAOs are capable of? Quick example. I was one of the first people to join CityDAO. I'd seen a tweet by Scott Fitsimones. Scott's a nice guy, smart and hard working, but he's not superhuman. Following his tweet, he simply opened a Discord channel, and populated it with a few basic ideas. Almost immediately, like magic, a DAO materialized with the powers of a genie. More than a thousand people joined in no time and immediately began collaborating. Teams were set, governance began forming, outside partners were identified and engaged, the $WriteRace was won (on their first try), and real land was evaluated in preparation for acquisition in the future. All this before a token that could further align incentives was even distributed. These DAO collaborators were fueled by the joy of working on an interesting project for a good cause with others who share the mission, and the promise of future ownership of the outcome.

[DAO‚Äôs to find missing people? $$ for your best ideas ‚Äî Mirror](https://danconway.mirror.xyz/r6fadqo3KF_ndkllf0iJfbOVwmk-kXF4dH-C_z-moaQ)

### üî•

Definitely check out CommonLands by community member @rlamis!

> Working to close the generational wealth gap through community-owned affordable, permanent housing using innovative tech.

[CommonLands - Coming Soon](https://www.commonlands.us/)

p.s. will have some more updates on CommonLands in the future as they are up to some BIG things! üòâ

### üî•

@Phil Levin was a founding team member of Culdesac, whose ambition is to build a car-free city in the US. Super cool idea! Check it out below:

![](https://chance.ghost.io/content/images/2021/08/Screen-Shot-2021-08-09-at-12.16.14-PM.png)

[Culdesac | Experience Someplace Better](https://culdesac.com/)

### üî•

Big shout-out to @scottfits (and everyone who has helped with suggestions / edits) for the first two CityDAO Mirror posts!! Here are the posts so far:

[Announcing CityDAO - a city built on Ethereum ‚Äî Mirror](https://city.mirror.xyz/mZOpFWkTi0M2lVE1PsT1e2sJwdUT4PdgetHw_S4hS5A)

[Become the First Citizen of CityDAO and name our first city parcel](https://city.mirror.xyz/CmZyzy3tuOu4TPUnfsYaR1Zoub1yiej6ZoOEuoayDQM)

### üî•

Some recent tweets we love:

[](https://twitter.com/m_j_rossman/status/1421629107117428749?s=20)

[](https://twitter.com/SyndicateDAO/status/1422703077929361412?s=20)

[](https://twitter.com/CityDao/status/1423365937353216000?s=20)

[](https://twitter.com/NpappaG/status/1422323969718427650?s=20)

[](https://twitter.com/thesidsridhar/status/1421157994197364736?s=20)

***

## Overheard in CityDAO

> Viva la Wyoming

> Vision of a DAO city is fascinating to me

> So much innovation happening in portugal wow

> Cause it‚Äôs crypto-tax free lol

> Even with influencers, there should be a balance. The ape community is dragging the devs there on Twitter as we speak bc of the shift to hyper focusing on influencers rather than nurturing the current community.

> Someone say BaconDAO?

> imagining a parcel map like google maps with ENS addresses. so you can see who owns each and make requests to them. interesting concept for sure

> the DAO has been officially incorporated

> üè° Creator Cabins is here to support City DAO for $WRITE RACE

> The possibilities are endless, and the stakes are extremely high

> I‚Äôm new here and confirming I‚Äôm not a bot. My expertise is in building great financial products that users love. I think we can do that with CityDAO!

> 3D printing houses in general is such an awesome concept/industry, esp. for creating affordable housing. ¬†Also looks like they are primed for when CityDAO expands to the moon/Mars üôÉ

> I'm a former urban planner and now work on streamlining multifamily and condominium development

> currently in law school, planning on working with daos + nfts + web3 once I graduate. Fascinated by this project!

> Love the mission here, and excited to get involved!

> Have just voted for our City! on fire üî•

> I much prefer modular homes to Tiny Homes and love this community being built near Austin

> My 'day job' is creating intergenerational co-living communities, where older and younger people together and support each other. ¬†Also a real estate investor of niche asset classes like co-living, co-working and government-leased properties. ¬†I'm fascinated by the intersection of DeFi and Real Estate, particularly as a means to re-invent the way we value and underwrite real estate.

> Hello folks. Fed here. I am interested in restoring "true community" to our lives.

> I went down the NFT and DAO rabbit hole at the start of 2021 and I don‚Äôt want to come out. I‚Äôm currently a member of FingerPrintsDAO, SquiggleDAO amd Muse0. I joined this group as I‚Äôm really interested in how a DAO community can come together to impact the real world, particularly in land ownership models.

> Love the Wyoming area - Love the concept of a DAO holding onto land - so I must love CityDAO! A bit about me: Work at a cryptocurrency exchange in the US. Helped co-found a charitable endowment platform/DAO on Terra.

> BaconDAO is realeasing a member rewards system in the coming weeks to identify contributions through mee6 levels and significant contributions through recognition through team members

> Imagine as a land owner receiving messages of offers to join a DAO to use adjacent parcels together (without revealing their personal contact information to the offerer), or a camper who wants to lease a spot next Wednesday for a week, or an owner of an adjacent parcel who wants explicit permission to walk across your parcel when accessing theirs (if that wasn't baked into the original parcel NFT head-lease.), or...

> Wow, interesting points here about rural zoning and hostility

> Nice community call!

> Tell me why I live in austin and this is my first time hearing about this lol

> WE'RE TOP 10! KEEP GOING!!!!!

***

### üîä

Thanks to @Justin1066 who shared this awesome twitter thread re: insights on challenges of assembling land and purchasing as a group of people

[](https://twitter.com/zachklein/status/1422293114480250880?s=20)

### üîä

Thanks to @R3sist who shared this interesting overview of Coordinape:

[Decentralized payroll management for DAOs](https://medium.com/iearn/decentralized-payroll-management-for-daos-b2252160c543)

Here's a couple of gem-stone memes by @bpetes:

![](https://chance.ghost.io/content/images/2021/08/image-7.png)

![](https://chance.ghost.io/content/images/2021/08/image-8.png)

That's all for this roundup!

See y'all next time,

\-- Chance Taken

title: PaperclipDAO's landmark first trade... and a tribute to the NFTs that got away
body:
We just made our first trade! Paperclip DAO has swapped one $PAPER/$CLIP NFT for the [1/5 SE Earthen Concept Art Card](https://opensea.io/assets/0x76be3b62873462d2142405439777e971754e8e77/42) offered by [@bitcoinPalmer](https://twitter.com/bitcoinPalmer/status/1425273580749742081). Palmer welcome to PaperclipDAO! üñá

We weighed several factors in making a final decision on which trade to accept. We care about more than just the economic value of a trade; we value the culture, story, and journey of the NFT as well. We also had to make a hard call about whether to honor the past or push towards the future. Our final poll after hours of discussion was a dead heat:

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/7af0279e-a154-4986-9893-743dee2c21c1.jpeg?height=756&width=1169)

It wasn‚Äôt easy, but we ultimately decided to go with a trade that highlighted the future of NFTs. 

PaperclipDAO now owns a 1/5 SE Earthen Concept Art Card, which can be used in [Parallel](https://www.parallel.life/), a sci-fi collectable game composed of digital collectible cards that can be combined into decks that dictate the game (think Magic at the Gathering or Pokemon). The Earthen Concept Art NFT was given only to early supporters of Parallel, and it's gratifying to see people taking the opportunity to recount [the NFT's unique history](https://twitter.com/GarretteDVF/status/1425657844414746629?s=20). 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/69760d51-7aa0-4025-be9e-15367b4fee13.jpeg?height=1620&width=1080)

It‚Äôs a promising future for digitally scarce, playable cards, and since the purchase of these NFTs funds the development of the game itself, it also demonstrates the wide range of utility of NFTs. Who knows, maybe the team will let us bestow some magical paperclip power? üí´

This decision wasn‚Äôt easy; we were blown away by the offers we received and quickly realized that the hardest part would be parting with the incredible NFTs that we couldn‚Äôt accept. Check out the full [Round 1 offer thread](https://twitter.com/PaperclipDAO/status/1425117547251343369) to see all the amazing offers. 

Given the quick turnaround, we only have time to highlight a few of our favorites. In no particular order, here is our homage to the ones that got away in Round 1: 

- Our very first offer came from JPG‚Äôs [Maria Paula Fernandez](https://twitter.com/MPtherealMVP/status/1425118535857156101), who just plain got it and proposed a trade for [simulacra](https://opensea.io/assets/0x495f947276749ce646f68ac8c248420045cb7b5e/8112316025873927737505937898915153732580103913704334048512380170839124869121) before we had explained the project at all. Legend.  
- Adam Cochran offered this [Cool Cat](https://twitter.com/adamscochran/status/1425206741084610566), complete with sunglasses and a great story. As competition heated up, he increased the offer to [4 Cool Cats](https://twitter.com/adamscochran/status/1425249645253496832). Adam later put forth an offer that absolutely blew his first two away! [He proposed a collection of 14 historic NFTs](https://twitter.com/adamscochran/status/1425487421895057408), in a collection titled Moments in Our History. This collection represents unique fists, influential artists, and rare defunct collectibles that helped shape the NFT space and have led to the NFT renaissance we're living right now. It‚Äôs an excellent read.
- [A $HASH of the @paperclipDAO UNIv3 NFT](https://twitter.com/blasteasy/status/1425181303767543815) was also minted and proposed. Proof of Beauty is stunning. Just look at them. And to honor our project with a mint of the $PAPER/$CLIP NFT floored us. [Sisyphus](https://twitter.com/0xSisyphus) also offered [an original Proof of Beauty](https://opensea.io/assets/0xe18a32192ed95b0fe9d70d19e5025f103475d7ba/57896044618658097711785492504343953927315557066662158946655541218820101244980), for Beeple's first Everydays mint on-chain in another historic NFT moment offered for the first trade. 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/826bf6cf-b6d7-420c-bade-3d6420592cfa.jpeg?height=1800&width=1125)

- [MoonCatRescue](https://mooncatrescue.com/) is absolutely one of the great NFT stories, with a community rediscovering and rescuing these Mooncats that have been ‚Äútrapped‚Äù since the project began in 2017 (!!!). No way to do it justice here--[you have to read about it](https://mooncatrescue.com/). We were lucky to be offered several Mooncats ([this one](https://opensea.io/assets/0xc3f733ca98e0dad0386979eb96fb1722a1a05e69/1549), [this one](https://opensea.io/assets/0x7c40c393dc0f283f318791d746d894ddd3693572/2223), and [this one](https://opensea.io/assets/0xc3f733ca98e0dad0386979eb96fb1722a1a05e69/18995)). 
- [Folia](https://twitter.com/foliafoliafolia/status/1425172915889266693)‚Äôs Kudzu virus is the genius brainchild of Billy Rennekamp, one of the NFT OG‚Äôs ([with the NFT to prove it](https://opensea.io/assets/0x72148fcae1d77eebcd9486af7e656bb736c213ef/3?embed=night)). There‚Äôs nothing else like it--it‚Äôs a permanent NFT that will never leave your wallet. When you send it to someone it mutates and they get their own, permanent, NFT. We were offered 2 ([this one](https://twitter.com/foliafoliafolia/status/1425172915889266693) and [this one](https://opensea.io/assets/0xdce09254dd3592381b6a5b7a848b29890b656e01/2000062)).
- [Calvin Liu](https://twitter.com/cjliu49/status/1425235759934541829) offered up a [Non-fungible Pepe](https://sudoswap.xyz/#/swap/N4Igtghg1gpgTgQQM5JgFwCITREAuEABgA8BOAFgGMAzSgEzoHZCXW32POvufPzeBgoYIAcw8RPEBGSbLkcZ8pbMXK1ggEzrtA8vw0BWRlMakty6lNJjyANhh0Dt8hEKUYtxiIMwARgeoqGC0DSl8RK3IYamCdOM4AZhh4nRAAGnBoeGRUNAQwAHsAVwA7NHwQKXSQHFhEFHQsHAqSChp6JhSuwn5ulLE%2BlNVB7WGRtTHx%2BXMptT1CQ2NTGflKBOdyDV8XcgMNDRgRYwTSUnoliF8GEXJGS6kpGJEB2ZUzOltXiWra7Ia8wqlcoEKoZGDEAAOAEs4NgoQUSgAVKFgGAAZRglARdCQFXWWj0GlICQS1UgdQQDDgMBQLWIGjoDI0EEepF81DorkZ63I20cJmoIlsBz2MVoGmYpIyv0QVJpuIIJC%2B1RiMAASpiodCYGVKXRqbTFcQohpqNZKKR7AyDKQDBARAkEAAxCAJAzPEQAYRc1HdCDW5ASAFE9NVUCU6Nk5YaiMRlRlyfAnTAYC0flk4MnU4qwxAADbAyrCoUJRgGAxSG0GargygACwgJQA5jA9QaFbHCGJ2RXCE7Pb4nVIRL5SA9CAZboRbCcYLbbDJ9sTGMYNGGoU2StgitS6VJKLYK8t1lITncqCIzRBqIxenRAi5nJQpBAx7dI7ZqNQtqFCMw6KeE6UNOZa2j0Cy%2BPuviML4-hPIwn68nc37kKeAQJAsl5mDB%2By3L4NAUPckF0BOviEA4EAQFQvgJFopIAL5AA), which was a close contender (see final poll above). Creator Matt Furie is well known for creating Pepe the Frog back in 2005 for a comic called ‚ÄúBoys Club,‚Äù which subsequently went on to become the Internet meme that we all know and love. 
- [@JordanLzG](https://twitter.com/JordanLzG/status/1425259957658824709) splashed the pot by offering [The Title Open Edition by Pak](https://niftygateway.com/collections/pakopen). Pak is an anonymous creator at the forefront of experience-based art. His work was recently auctioned by Sotheby‚Äôs and his collection The Title (from which The Cheap hails) was one of the best NFT-based experiences in 2020. We were also offered 3 in Pak‚Äôs [The Flipper](https://opensea.io/assets/0x090c53bac270768759c8f4c93151bd1a808a280e/18700020009) series.
- In a very special offer, [devops199fan](https://twitter.com/cjliu49/status/1425235759934541829) offered [#404/420 of the EthereumFilm Infinite Garden Bloom NFT](https://twitter.com/devops199fan/status/1425257222364295174) in collaboration with the one and only [pplpleasr](https://twitter.com/pplpleasr1) ü§© . Each NFT is tied to select on-screen credits in the film, which will be the first feature-length Ethereum documentary and the first documentary funded via NFTs. 
- [Astrocryptids](https://twitter.com/CoffeeTimesTW/status/1425254256563482627?s=20) is a charming little project where a twitter transmission bot ‚Äúbeams‚Äù mysterious code to an artist who then creates algorithmic sprites with a unique star code. [We were offered 7](https://twitter.com/CoffeeTimesTW/status/1425293234381541381). 
- Artblocks is the premier name in abstract NFT art, and among several Artblocks curated pieces we were offered was a gorgeous [Rinascita](https://artblocks.io/token/121000845).
- [Jonathan Mann](https://twitter.com/songadaymann/status/1425431457053487104), the [songadaymann](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5dgSLSe4qsY) himself, wrote us a song about the man that did/didn‚Äôt invent the paperclip! This ranked the highest in paperclip-iness! Truly the one that got away. He‚Äôs since started [an auction for the song](https://twitter.com/songadaymann/status/1425773677581324296?s=21) on Zora.
- For the real OGs, we were offered a very rare [5x symmetrical clover](https://opensea.io/assets/0xb55c5cac5014c662fdbf21a2c59cd45403c482fd/226854885927226686664340372062743472810) (from Clovers.Network) of which only 55 were ever found. - We were offered a [Pudgy Penguin](https://opensea.io/assets/0xbd3531da5cf5857e7cfaa92426877b022e612cf8/2581), [a Meebit](https://opensea.io/assets/0x7bd29408f11d2bfc23c34f18275bbf23bb716bc7/10204), and a [baby Bored Ape](https://opensea.io/assets/0x495f947276749ce646f68ac8c248420045cb7b5e/56725515187736557735990102071773169311374405330094350701016781023838914740225) - a nod to the many emerging icons of the NFT world.      
One interesting offer included all three NFT standards: an ERC-20 ([an $XMON](https://etherscan.io/token/0x3aada3e213abf8529606924d8d1c55cbdc70bf74)), ERC-721 ([an Artblocks](https://opensea.io/assets/0xa7d8d9ef8d8ce8992df33d8b8cf4aebabd5bd270/44000143)), and ERC-1155 ([a Parallel](https://opensea.io/assets/0x76be3b62873462d2142405439777e971754e8e77/10247)) 
- [Pixel Portraits](https://twitter.com/thepxlportraits) is a fun project with portraits of interesting people in the cryptopunks style. NFT legend Nick Johnson offered his portrait of [Alan Turing](https://opensea.io/assets/0x495f947276749ce646f68ac8c248420045cb7b5e/8112316025873927737505937898915153732580103913704334048512380170839124869121).
- Finally, we were [given a choice](https://twitter.com/paperclipDAO/status/1425117547251343369) between 1.) a rare 1/27 [XCOPY piece](https://opensea.io/assets/0x580a29fa60b86aaff102743de5cba60bb5f9de75/329) from an obscure NFT project launched in 2018 or 2.) a 0xmons named [Maznoth](https://opensea.io/assets/0x0427743df720801825a5c82e0582b1e915e0f750/233) + [their unique sound](https://opensea.io/assets/0x83b28b0a2d44f48ea81d9da535a5ccb74ef71a05/233). 

Each of these offers makes our story all the richer and we couldn‚Äôt be more excited about our first trade. In Round 1, we picked the future. But the past always has a way of coming back... Round 2 starts now! üñáüñá

title: How to Swap on SushiSwap (Polygon Network)
body:
## What is SushiSwap? üç£
[SushiSwap](https://sushi.com/) is a decentralized exchange (DEX) and lending market on Ethereum. Unlike a centralized exchange, SushiSwap is non-custodial and trustless. It uses an automated market maker (AMM) model to facilitate peer-to-peer exchanges of any two ERC-20 tokens in real time.

SushiSwap has quickly evolved into one of the most sophisticated token liquidity engines in decentralized finance (DeFi) by releasing innovative product offerings that stretch our conception of what a DEX is supposed to be. In addition to the steady flow of new features, SushiSwap has expanded across multiple blockchains, setting itself up to be an extremely versatile multi-chain DEX.

## What is Polygon? üåê

[Polygon](https://polygon.technology/) is a protocol and framework for building and connecting Ethereum-compatible blockchain networks. As many of us are aware, transacting on Ethereum can be costly to the average user when gas prices are high. Polygon offers fast and cheap transactions as a Layer 2 scalability solution to the Ethereum network, allowing users to experiment with DeFi without incurring substantial gas fees. 

Since its release, Polygon has seen a wave of DeFi protocols launch on the network, including Aave, Curve, Balancer, SushiSwap, and more. 

## SushiSwap x Polygon Swap Tutorial üéì
In this tutorial, we‚Äôll walkthrough how to perform a simple token swap using SushiSwap‚Äôs DEX on the Polygon network.

### First, you‚Äôll need to set up your MetaMask for Polygon.
- Login to MetaMask on your browser and click on **‚ÄòEthereum Mainnet‚Äô**.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/3097504d-17cc-4f92-bea0-c0627248b5ef.jpeg?height=54&width=341)


- From the dropdown, select **‚ÄòCustom RPC‚Äô**.
- Enter the following information into the available fields:
     - **Network Name:** Polygon
     - **New RPC URL:** https://rpc-mainnet.maticvigil.com/
     - **ChainID:** 137
     - **Symbol:** MATIC
     - **Block Explorer URL:** https://polygonscan.com/
- Click ‚Äò**Save**‚Äô.

### Next, bridge some assets from the Ethereum Mainnet to Polygon. 
You can follow [this tutorial](https://docs.matic.network/docs/develop/wallets/matic-web-wallet/web-wallet-v2-guide/#depositing-funds-from-ethereum-to-matic) to bridge assets using the Matic Web Wallet, or you can follow the below steps to bridge your assets using Zapper. 
- Go to https://zapper.fi/ and connect your MetaMask wallet.
- Once connected, select **‚ÄòBridge‚Äô** from the sidebar. 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/db26d91d-2363-460c-bff3-82633975a0e6.jpeg?height=370&width=216)

- Switch your MetaMask network back to Ethereum Mainnet if it isn‚Äôt already by selecting **‚ÄòEthereum Mainnet‚Äô** from the network dropdown (the list where you found **‚ÄòCustom RPC‚Äô** above).
- Select the token you would like to transfer to Polygon and the token you would like to receive in exchange on Polygon from the dropdown menus. Then, enter the amount you would like to transfer.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/6353c5b6-2d8c-4967-9334-737fbbae97e2.jpeg?height=698&width=467)


- Click **‚ÄòConfirm‚Äô** and approve the transaction in MetaMask. 
- Approximately 5-10 minutes following confirmation on Ethereum, your assets will arrive on Polygon. You can check this by switching back to the Polygon network in MetaMask and verifying the tokens are in your wallet (note: if you don't see your assets, try [adding the token to MetaMask](https://metamask.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/360015489031-How-to-add-unlisted-tokens-custom-tokens-in-MetaMask)). 

### Now that the housekeeping is out of the way, let's swap some tokens. 

- Head over to https://sushi.com/ and click the **‚ÄòEnter App‚Äô** button.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/e640e892-fcd2-4ecc-af38-99b57ea63bd7.jpeg?height=489&width=1098)

- Connect your Metamask to SushiSwap by selecting **'Connect to a Wallet'** in the upper-right corner of the page and following the prompts. 

- Once your wallet is connected to SushiSwap, make sure your MetaMask is connected to the Polygon network. If properly connected, you will see ‚ÄòPolygon (Matic)‚Äô in the upper right corner of the page. 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/203e5bb4-acbe-44be-a130-6c5be5a038ab.jpeg?height=58&width=238)

- Select the asset you would like to swap from and the asset you would like to swap to, and fill in the desired amount.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/1587850e-d49e-4710-a4be-6d879b2d0858.jpeg?height=451&width=698)

- When you are ready, select **‚ÄòSwap‚Äô**. You will be prompted to verify and confirm the transaction details. If everything looks good, hit **'Confirm Swap'**.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/64474979-41ed-4a0e-91f2-af429006ccf2.jpeg?height=662&width=426)

- If this is your first time swapping the token via SushiSwap on Polygon, you will be prompted to confirm a MetaMask transaction to allow SushiSwap to spend your tokens. You will only need to do this once. **'Confirm'** the transaction.

- After the approval, MetaMask will again prompt you to approve a transaction. This time the approval is for the actual swap. Hit **‚ÄòConfirm‚Äô** once you are ready.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/de5f0df0-8d20-422b-847c-bb7c60983cf3.jpeg?height=489&width=329)

### Congratulations! ü•≥ 
You have just completed your first swap using SushiSwap on Polygon. Make sure you [add the new token to MetaMask](https://metamask.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/360015489031-How-to-add-unlisted-tokens-custom-tokens-in-MetaMask) if it isn't already there. After a few minutes, you should see the correct balance in your wallet.

Welcome to the permissionless and decentralized future of value exchange.

SushiSwap has quickly evolved into one of the most sophisticated token liquidity engines in decentralized finance (DeFi) by releasing innovative product offerings that stretch our conception of what a DEX is supposed to be. In addition to the steady flow of new features, SushiSwap has expanded across multiple blockchains, setting itself up to be an extremely versatile multi-chain DEX.

## What is Polygon? üåê

[Polygon](https://polygon.technology/) is a protocol and framework for building and connecting Ethereum-compatible blockchain networks. As many of us are aware, transacting on Ethereum can be costly to the average user when gas prices are high. Polygon offers fast and cheap transactions as a Layer 2 scalability solution to the Ethereum network, allowing users to experiment with DeFi without incurring substantial gas fees. 

Since its release, Polygon has seen a wave of DeFi protocols launch on the network, including Aave, Curve, Balancer, SushiSwap, and more. 

## SushiSwap x Polygon Swap Tutorial üéì
In this tutorial, we‚Äôll walkthrough how to perform a simple token swap using SushiSwap‚Äôs DEX on the Polygon network.

### First, you‚Äôll need to set up your MetaMask for Polygon.
- Login to MetaMask on your browser and click on **‚ÄòEthereum Mainnet‚Äô**.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/3097504d-17cc-4f92-bea0-c0627248b5ef.jpeg?height=54&width=341)


- From the dropdown, select **‚ÄòCustom RPC‚Äô**.
- Enter the following information into the available fields:
     - **Network Name:** Polygon
     - **New RPC URL:** https://rpc-mainnet.maticvigil.com/
     - **ChainID:** 137
     - **Symbol:** MATIC
     - **Block Explorer URL:** https://polygonscan.com/
- Click ‚Äò**Save**‚Äô.

### Next, bridge some assets from the Ethereum Mainnet to Polygon. 
You can follow [this tutorial](https://docs.matic.network/docs/develop/wallets/matic-web-wallet/web-wallet-v2-guide/#depositing-funds-from-ethereum-to-matic) to bridge assets using the Matic Web Wallet, or you can follow the below steps to bridge your assets using Zapper. 
- Go to https://zapper.fi/ and connect your MetaMask wallet.
- Once connected, select **‚ÄòBridge‚Äô** from the sidebar. 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/db26d91d-2363-460c-bff3-82633975a0e6.jpeg?height=370&width=216)

- Switch your MetaMask network back to Ethereum Mainnet if it isn‚Äôt already by selecting **‚ÄòEthereum Mainnet‚Äô** from the network dropdown (the list where you found **‚ÄòCustom RPC‚Äô** above).
- Select the token you would like to transfer to Polygon and the token you would like to receive in exchange on Polygon from the dropdown menus. Then, enter the amount you would like to transfer.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/6353c5b6-2d8c-4967-9334-737fbbae97e2.jpeg?height=698&width=467)


- Click **‚ÄòConfirm‚Äô** and approve the transaction in MetaMask. 
- Approximately 5-10 minutes following confirmation on Ethereum, your assets will arrive on Polygon. You can check this by switching back to the Polygon network in MetaMask and verifying the tokens are in your wallet (note: if you don't see your assets, try [adding the token to MetaMask](https://metamask.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/360015489031-How-to-add-unlisted-tokens-custom-tokens-in-MetaMask)). 

### Now that the housekeeping is out of the way, let's swap some tokens. 

- Head over to https://sushi.com/ and click the **‚ÄòEnter App‚Äô** button.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/e640e892-fcd2-4ecc-af38-99b57ea63bd7.jpeg?height=489&width=1098)

- Connect your Metamask to SushiSwap by selecting **'Connect to a Wallet'** in the upper-right corner of the page and following the prompts. 

- Once your wallet is connected to SushiSwap, make sure your MetaMask is connected to the Polygon network. If properly connected, you will see ‚ÄòPolygon (Matic)‚Äô in the upper right corner of the page. 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/203e5bb4-acbe-44be-a130-6c5be5a038ab.jpeg?height=58&width=238)

- Select the asset you would like to swap from and the asset you would like to swap to, and fill in the desired amount.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/1587850e-d49e-4710-a4be-6d879b2d0858.jpeg?height=451&width=698)

- When you are ready, select **‚ÄòSwap‚Äô**. You will be prompted to verify and confirm the transaction details. If everything looks good, hit **'Confirm Swap'**.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/64474979-41ed-4a0e-91f2-af429006ccf2.jpeg?height=662&width=426)

- If this is your first time swapping the token via SushiSwap on Polygon, you will be prompted to confirm a MetaMask transaction to allow SushiSwap to spend your tokens. You will only need to do this once. **'Confirm'** the transaction.

- After the approval, MetaMask will again prompt you to approve a transaction. This time the approval is for the actual swap. Hit **‚ÄòConfirm‚Äô** once you are ready.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/de5f0df0-8d20-422b-847c-bb7c60983cf3.jpeg?height=489&width=329)

### Congratulations! ü•≥ 
You have just completed your first swap using SushiSwap on Polygon. Make sure you [add the new token to MetaMask](https://metamask.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/360015489031-How-to-add-unlisted-tokens-custom-tokens-in-MetaMask) if it isn't already there. After a few minutes, you should see the correct balance in your wallet.

Welcome to the permissionless and decentralized future of value exchange.

title: PaperclipDAO's landmark first trade... and a tribute to the NFTs that got away
body:
We just made our first trade! Paperclip DAO has swapped one $PAPER/$CLIP NFT for the [1/5 SE Earthen Concept Art Card](https://opensea.io/assets/0x76be3b62873462d2142405439777e971754e8e77/42) offered by [@bitcoinPalmer](https://twitter.com/bitcoinPalmer/status/1425273580749742081). Palmer welcome to PaperclipDAO! üñá

We weighed several factors in making a final decision on which trade to accept. We care about more than just the economic value of a trade; we value the culture, story, and journey of the NFT as well. We also had to make a hard call about whether to honor the past or push towards the future. Our final poll after hours of discussion was a dead heat:

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/7af0279e-a154-4986-9893-743dee2c21c1.jpeg?height=756&width=1169)

It wasn‚Äôt easy, but we ultimately decided to go with a trade that highlighted the future of NFTs. 

PaperclipDAO now owns a 1/5 SE Earthen Concept Art Card, which can be used in [Parallel](https://www.parallel.life/), a sci-fi collectable game composed of digital collectible cards that can be combined into decks that dictate the game (think Magic at the Gathering or Pokemon). The Earthen Concept Art NFT was given only to early supporters of Parallel, and it's gratifying to see people taking the opportunity to recount [the NFT's unique history](https://twitter.com/GarretteDVF/status/1425657844414746629?s=20). 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/69760d51-7aa0-4025-be9e-15367b4fee13.jpeg?height=1620&width=1080)

It‚Äôs a promising future for digitally scarce, playable cards, and since the purchase of these NFTs funds the development of the game itself, it also demonstrates the wide range of utility of NFTs. Who knows, maybe the team will let us bestow some magical paperclip power? üí´

This decision wasn‚Äôt easy; we were blown away by the offers we received and quickly realized that the hardest part would be parting with the incredible NFTs that we couldn‚Äôt accept. Check out the full [Round 1 offer thread](https://twitter.com/PaperclipDAO/status/1425117547251343369) to see all the amazing offers. 

Given the quick turnaround, we only have time to highlight a few of our favorites. In no particular order, here is our homage to the ones that got away in Round 1: 

- Our very first offer came from JPG‚Äôs [Maria Paula Fernandez](https://twitter.com/MPtherealMVP/status/1425118535857156101), who just plain got it and proposed a trade for [simulacra](https://opensea.io/assets/0x8644053aadb0df38e7734f5010fef643316bbb92/28) before we had explained the project at all. Legend.  
- Adam Cochran offered this [Cool Cat](https://twitter.com/adamscochran/status/1425206741084610566), complete with sunglasses and a great story. As competition heated up, he increased the offer to [4 Cool Cats](https://twitter.com/adamscochran/status/1425249645253496832). Adam later put forth an offer that absolutely blew his first two away! [He proposed a collection of 14 historic NFTs](https://twitter.com/adamscochran/status/1425487421895057408), in a collection titled Moments in Our History. This collection represents unique fists, influential artists, and rare defunct collectibles that helped shape the NFT space and have led to the NFT renaissance we're living right now. It‚Äôs an excellent read.
- [A $HASH of the @paperclipDAO UNIv3 NFT](https://twitter.com/blasteasy/status/1425181303767543815) was also minted and proposed. Proof of Beauty is stunning. Just look at them. And to honor our project with a mint of the $PAPER/$CLIP NFT floored us. [Sisyphus](https://twitter.com/0xSisyphus) also offered [an original Proof of Beauty](https://opensea.io/assets/0xe18a32192ed95b0fe9d70d19e5025f103475d7ba/57896044618658097711785492504343953927315557066662158946655541218820101244980), for Beeple's first Everydays mint on-chain in another historic NFT moment offered for the first trade. 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/826bf6cf-b6d7-420c-bade-3d6420592cfa.jpeg?height=1800&width=1125)

- [MoonCatRescue](https://mooncatrescue.com/) is absolutely one of the great NFT stories, with a community rediscovering and rescuing these Mooncats that have been ‚Äútrapped‚Äù since the project began in 2017 (!!!). No way to do it justice here--[you have to read about it](https://mooncatrescue.com/). We were lucky to be offered several Mooncats ([this one](https://opensea.io/assets/0xc3f733ca98e0dad0386979eb96fb1722a1a05e69/1549), [this one](https://opensea.io/assets/0x7c40c393dc0f283f318791d746d894ddd3693572/2223), and [this one](https://opensea.io/assets/0xc3f733ca98e0dad0386979eb96fb1722a1a05e69/18995)). 
- [Folia](https://twitter.com/foliafoliafolia/status/1425172915889266693)‚Äôs Kudzu virus is the genius brainchild of Billy Rennekamp, one of the NFT OG‚Äôs ([with the NFT to prove it](https://opensea.io/assets/0x72148fcae1d77eebcd9486af7e656bb736c213ef/3?embed=night)). There‚Äôs nothing else like it--it‚Äôs a permanent NFT that will never leave your wallet. When you send it to someone it mutates and they get their own, permanent, NFT. We were offered 2 ([this one](https://twitter.com/foliafoliafolia/status/1425172915889266693) and [this one](https://opensea.io/assets/0xdce09254dd3592381b6a5b7a848b29890b656e01/2000062)).
- [Calvin Liu](https://twitter.com/cjliu49/status/1425235759934541829) offered up a [Non-fungible Pepe](https://sudoswap.xyz/#/swap/N4Igtghg1gpgTgQQM5JgFwCITREAuEABgA8BOAFgGMAzSgEzoHZCXW32POvufPzeBgoYIAcw8RPEBGSbLkcZ8pbMXK1ggEzrtA8vw0BWRlMakty6lNJjyANhh0Dt8hEKUYtxiIMwARgeoqGC0DSl8RK3IYamCdOM4AZhh4nRAAGnBoeGRUNAQwAHsAVwA7NHwQKXSQHFhEFHQsHAqSChp6JhSuwn5ulLE%2BlNVB7WGRtTHx%2BXMptT1CQ2NTGflKBOdyDV8XcgMNDRgRYwTSUnoliF8GEXJGS6kpGJEB2ZUzOltXiWra7Ia8wqlcoEKoZGDEAAOAEs4NgoQUSgAVKFgGAAZRglARdCQFXWWj0GlICQS1UgdQQDDgMBQLWIGjoDI0EEepF81DorkZ63I20cJmoIlsBz2MVoGmYpIyv0QVJpuIIJC%2B1RiMAASpiodCYGVKXRqbTFcQohpqNZKKR7AyDKQDBARAkEAAxCAJAzPEQAYRc1HdCDW5ASAFE9NVUCU6Nk5YaiMRlRlyfAnTAYC0flk4MnU4qwxAADbAyrCoUJRgGAxSG0GargygACwgJQA5jA9QaFbHCGJ2RXCE7Pb4nVIRL5SA9CAZboRbCcYLbbDJ9sTGMYNGGoU2StgitS6VJKLYK8t1lITncqCIzRBqIxenRAi5nJQpBAx7dI7ZqNQtqFCMw6KeE6UNOZa2j0Cy%2BPuviML4-hPIwn68nc37kKeAQJAsl5mDB%2By3L4NAUPckF0BOviEA4EAQFQvgJFopIAL5AA), which was a close contender (see final poll above). Creator Matt Furie is well known for creating Pepe the Frog back in 2005 for a comic called ‚ÄúBoys Club,‚Äù which subsequently went on to become the Internet meme that we all know and love. 
- [@JordanLzG](https://twitter.com/JordanLzG/status/1425259957658824709) splashed the pot by offering [The Title Open Edition by Pak](https://niftygateway.com/collections/pakopen). Pak is an anonymous creator at the forefront of experience-based art. His work was recently auctioned by Sotheby‚Äôs and his collection The Title (from which The Cheap hails) was one of the best NFT-based experiences in 2020. We were also offered 3 in Pak‚Äôs [The Flipper](https://opensea.io/assets/0x090c53bac270768759c8f4c93151bd1a808a280e/18700020009) series.
- In a very special offer, [devops199fan](https://twitter.com/cjliu49/status/1425235759934541829) offered [#404/420 of the EthereumFilm Infinite Garden Bloom NFT](https://twitter.com/devops199fan/status/1425257222364295174) in collaboration with the one and only [pplpleasr](https://twitter.com/pplpleasr1) ü§© . Each NFT is tied to select on-screen credits in the film, which will be the first feature-length Ethereum documentary and the first documentary funded via NFTs. 
- [Astrocryptids](https://twitter.com/CoffeeTimesTW/status/1425254256563482627?s=20) is a charming little project where a twitter transmission bot ‚Äúbeams‚Äù mysterious code to an artist who then creates algorithmic sprites with a unique star code. [We were offered 7](https://twitter.com/CoffeeTimesTW/status/1425293234381541381). 
- Artblocks is the premier name in abstract NFT art, and among several Artblocks curated pieces we were offered was a gorgeous [Rinascita](https://artblocks.io/token/121000845).
- [Jonathan Mann](https://twitter.com/songadaymann/status/1425431457053487104), the [songadaymann](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5dgSLSe4qsY) himself, wrote us a song about the man that did/didn‚Äôt invent the paperclip! This ranked the highest in paperclip-iness! Truly the one that got away. He‚Äôs since started [an auction for the song](https://twitter.com/songadaymann/status/1425773677581324296?s=21) on Zora.
- For the real OGs, we were offered a very rare [5x symmetrical clover](https://opensea.io/assets/0xb55c5cac5014c662fdbf21a2c59cd45403c482fd/226854885927226686664340372062743472810) (from Clovers.Network) of which only 55 were ever found. It has symmetry in both diagonals, x & y axes, and rotationally. It‚Äôs also a very lucky four leaf clover! 
- We were offered a [Pudgy Penguin](https://opensea.io/assets/0xbd3531da5cf5857e7cfaa92426877b022e612cf8/2581), [a Meebit](https://opensea.io/assets/0x7bd29408f11d2bfc23c34f18275bbf23bb716bc7/10204), and a [baby Bored Ape](https://opensea.io/assets/0x495f947276749ce646f68ac8c248420045cb7b5e/56725515187736557735990102071773169311374405330094350701016781023838914740225) - a nod to the many emerging icons of the NFT world.      
One interesting offer included all three NFT standards: an ERC-20 ([an $XMON](https://etherscan.io/token/0x3aada3e213abf8529606924d8d1c55cbdc70bf74)), ERC-721 ([an Artblocks](https://opensea.io/assets/0xa7d8d9ef8d8ce8992df33d8b8cf4aebabd5bd270/44000143)), and ERC-1155 ([a Parallel](https://opensea.io/assets/0x76be3b62873462d2142405439777e971754e8e77/10247)) 
- [Pixel Portraits](https://twitter.com/thepxlportraits) is a fun project with portraits of interesting people in the cryptopunks style. NFT legend Nick Johnson offered his portrait of [Alan Turing](https://opensea.io/assets/0x495f947276749ce646f68ac8c248420045cb7b5e/8112316025873927737505937898915153732580103913704334048512380170839124869121).
- Finally, we were [given a choice](https://twitter.com/paperclipDAO/status/1425117547251343369) between 1.) a rare 1/27 [XCOPY piece](https://opensea.io/assets/0x580a29fa60b86aaff102743de5cba60bb5f9de75/329) from an obscure NFT project launched in 2018 or 2.) a 0xmons named [Maznoth](https://opensea.io/assets/0x0427743df720801825a5c82e0582b1e915e0f750/233) + [their unique sound](https://opensea.io/assets/0x83b28b0a2d44f48ea81d9da535a5ccb74ef71a05/233). 

Each of these offers makes our story all the richer and we couldn‚Äôt be more excited about our first trade. In Round 1, we picked the future. But the past always has a way of coming back... Round 2 starts now! üñáüñá

title: Tutorial: How to Swap on Uniswap (Optimism)
body:
## What is Uniswap? ü¶Ñ
[Uniswap](https://uniswap.org/) is a decentralized finance (DeFi) protocol for pooling liquidity and trading ERC-20 tokens on Ethereum. Uniswap removes the need for trusted intermediaries when exchanging assets via its automated market maker (AMM) model. This means anyone can permissionlessly trade any ERC-20 token using the Uniswap protocol 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. 

As the leading decentralized exchange (DEX) in DeFi, Uniswap has facilitated over $300 billion of trading volume since inception. It is essential economic machinery, enabling peer-to-peer value transfer across all of Web3. 

## What is Optimism? ‚õìÔ∏è
[Optimism](https://optimism.io/) is an EVM-compatible Optimistic Rollup chain that is designed to be a fast, simple, and secure scaling solution for Ethereum. 

Optimism is a glimpse into what the future of Ethereum has in store for us. Transactions are nearly instant and gas fees are negligible. For newer entrants to DeFi, Layer 2 solutions like Optimism allows experimentation with protocols such as Uniswap with minimal transaction costs. 

## Uniswap x Optimism Swap Tutorial üìö

In this tutorial, we‚Äôll walkthrough how to perform a simple token swap using Uniswap on the Optimism network.

### First, you‚Äôll need to set up your MetaMask for Optimism. 
- Login to MetaMask on your browser and click on **‚ÄòEthereum Mainnet‚Äô**.
- From the dropdown, select **‚ÄòCustom RPC‚Äô**.
- Enter the following information into the available fields:
     - **Network Name:** Optimism
     - **New RPC URL:** https://mainnet.optimism.io 
     - **ChainID:** 10
     - **Symbol:** ETH
     - **Block Explorer URL:** https://optimistic.etherscan.io 
- Click **‚ÄòSave‚Äô**.

### Next, bridge some assets from the Ethereum Mainnet to Optimism.
- Go to https://gateway.optimism.io/welcome?chainId=1 and connect your MetaMask wallet. Make sure you are currently connected to the Ethereum Mainnet by selecting it from the network dropdown list in MetaMask (the same list where you found **‚ÄòCustom RPC‚Äô** earlier).
- Once connected, select the token you would like to transfer to Optimism and the token you would like to receive on Optimism from the dropdown menus. Then, enter the amount you would like to transfer.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/a2bfb32e-c9fd-45a6-90b4-fe13c520e25b.jpeg?height=532&width=489)

- Click **‚ÄòDeposit‚Äô** and follow the prompts, confirming the transaction on MetaMask. 
- Shortly after confirmation on Ethereum, your assets will arrive on the Optimism network. You can check this by switching back to the Optimism network in MetaMask and verifying the tokens are in your wallet (Note: if you don't see your assets, try [adding the token to MetaMask](https://metamask.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/360015489031-How-to-add-unlisted-tokens-custom-tokens-in-MetaMask)).

### Now, it's time to swap some tokens. 
- Head over to https://uniswap.org/ and click the **‚ÄòLaunch App‚Äô** button in the top-right corner.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/e980a64d-7159-4014-a259-41879e64fd52.jpeg?height=570&width=1885)


- If you haven‚Äôt already, switch over to the Optimism network in MetaMask. You can confirm that you are correctly connected by verifying that it says 'Optimism' in the upper right corner of the page.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/83c774d1-6d8c-4996-a714-d635a11a69e7.jpeg?height=65&width=461)

- Select the assets you would like to swap to and from, and fill in the desired amount.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/8effb663-0b0b-4b96-b092-3859ee6c0be9.jpeg?height=449&width=489)

- Once you are ready to swap, select **‚ÄòAllow the Uniswap Protocol to use your X‚Äô** and confirm the transaction in MetaMask. This will allow Uniswap to spend your tokens during the swap. 
- Finally, hit **‚ÄòSwap‚Äô**. You will be asked to verify the details one more time. After verifying, click **'Confirm Swap'** and approve the transaction in MetaMask. 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/50da480f-fbd0-4bf8-a196-a0fbd952a28b.jpeg?height=533&width=406)


### Congratulations! ü•≥ 

You have performed your first swap using Uniswap on Optimism. Make sure you [add the new token to MetaMask](https://metamask.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/360015489031-How-to-add-unlisted-tokens-custom-tokens-in-MetaMask) if it isn't already there. After a few minutes, you should see the correct balance in your wallet.

You've now successfully executed a permissionless exchange of crypto assets through Uniswap on one of the most advanced Ethereum scaling solutions available. 

What skill will you level up next on your web3 journey? üêáüï≥Ô∏è

**üõã Update:** The gates to our main event party are now open. [Access here.](https://discord.gg/2JHvZGSFbw)

**PS:** You will need to hold at least 20 $FFPARTY tokens in order to join. Make sure to get your hands on one before they're sold out! 

*See you on the other side!*

***

The metaverse won‚Äôt be built in a day ‚Äì there is still so much experimentation, exploration, and creation to be done. But we‚Äôd be remiss if we didn‚Äôt take a step back and celebrate how far we‚Äôve come. 

Crypto has evolved into its most social forms yet ‚Äî DAOs, NFTs, social tokens ‚Äî and we‚Äôre living in what will one day be called "the history of the metaverse". 

> Forefront has been at the bleeding edge of this present history, exploring the intersections of culture, value, and community. Now, coming up on **Forefront‚Äôs First Birthday**, we reflect, celebrate, and look ahead at the future we‚Äôre building.

This past year has been an absolutely wild ride. The Forefront community is known throughout the web3 ecosystem as a home for creativity, insight, and a whole lot of fun. From the launch of the FF Market, $FF token, and cross-DAO collabs to officially kicking off our first Season and bootstrapping a thriving community of over ~1800 members, Forefront has truly established itself as a leader in the social token space.

If we‚Äôve learned anything this past year, it‚Äôs this: **community is everything.** Without the community, Forefront wouldn‚Äôt be where it is today. 

And so, **for Forefront‚Äôs First Birthday, we‚Äôll be hosting a week of parties, events, and even a 24-hour adventure, in celebration of the community that brought us here today.**

***

The metaverse won‚Äôt be built in a day ‚Äì there is still so much experimentation, exploration, and creation to be done. But we‚Äôd be remiss if we didn‚Äôt take a step back and celebrate how far we‚Äôve come. 

Crypto has evolved into its most social forms yet ‚Äî DAOs, NFTs, social tokens ‚Äî and we‚Äôre living in what will one day be called "the history of the metaverse". 

> Forefront has been at the bleeding edge of this present history, exploring the intersections of culture, value, and community. Now, coming up on **Forefront‚Äôs First Birthday**, we reflect, celebrate, and look ahead at the future we‚Äôre building.

This past year has been an absolutely wild ride. The Forefront community is known throughout the web3 ecosystem as a home for creativity, insight, and a whole lot of fun. From the launch of the FF Market, $FF token, and cross-DAO collabs to officially kicking off our first Season and bootstrapping a thriving community of over ~1800 members, Forefront has truly established itself as a leader in the social token space.

If we‚Äôve learned anything this past year, it‚Äôs this: **community is everything.** Without the community, Forefront wouldn‚Äôt be where it is today. 

And so, **for Forefront‚Äôs First Birthday, we‚Äôll be hosting a week of parties, events, and even a 24-hour adventure, in celebration of the community that brought us here today.**

The main adventure is happening on the Friday 13th, on the metaverse (location to be disclosed prior to the event). Here‚Äôs a taste of what to expect:

title: Descent To The Core
body:
***Update: A PartyBid has launched to bid on the Log 3 NFT! ü•≥ [Join the party here](https://www.partybid.app/party/0x588692ce89f4d5F082885DbEc7Dd04941Db4F97e).***

**The first batch of songs out of Elektra drop on Monday August 16 at 4 PM ET in the [Songcamp Discord](https://discord.com/invite/wHsJD2sTpc) ‚Üí Add Event Reminder [here](https://www.addevent.com/event/XZ8020000)**

You continue on to the fallen city of Edin Prodo, after hearing from Cat & Alpha in [the second Log](https://zora.co/songcamp/4280). It sounds like Cat & Alpha have collected a second Capsule. 

You also learnt of The Prophecy Of The Elektra from Godina, who said they had ‚Äúa vision that brave warriors from a space unknown will appear out of a portal‚Äù. It sounds like that's referring to us... 

But how are we supposed to save Elektra? And how do we avoid ending up like the fallen warrior we just discovered?

You and the other travellers finally enter the destroyed city gates of Edin Prodo. You can sense that the energy here is different. Night has fallen, and sounds of distant rumbling creep into your ears ‚Äî as if little earthquakes are shaking Elektra some miles away. 

You see something glimmering softly in the distance.. another log device! The third one you've discovered. 

Just like [Log 1](https://zora.co/songcamp/4176) and [Log 2](https://zora.co/songcamp/4280), this one also has a recent message on it - recorded just 34 minutes ago. 

You press play...

[NFT](ethereum://0xabEFBc9fD2F806065b4f3C237d4b59D9A97Bcac7/4435)

You can collect this 1/1 NFT by bidding on Zora: https://zora.co/songcamp/4435

Collecting this 1/1 NFT also includes:
* A gift of 1000 $ELEKTRA
* Access to the ELEKTRA interactive web3 game on Discord
* One (1) invitation to Songcamp's Patron House -- a dedicated space for patrons of 1/1 Songcamp NFTs to receive deep + intimate access into the growing Songcamp community and activities.

***Jump into the [Elektra Discord interactive game](https://elektra.camp/#/) to unlock the full audio story of Cat & Alpha as they journey with you through Elektra.***

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/f9a97259-0279-4f2f-b87d-c841ff346c10.png?height=1080&width=1080)

## *Descent To The Core* is the result of collective creation within Songcamp Elektra

Elektra is the second experiment powered by *Songcamp* ‚Äî a web3 community interested in exploring at the edges of where music meets the new internet.

The audio-visual artwork for Log 3 was created by two teams within the Elektra camp ‚Äî the Visual Sqaud and The Swarm. The latter is a team of ~10 musicians creating the script, voiceovers, and sound design for Elektra's story-based pieces. See the contributors below:

[Log 3: Descent To The Core](split://0x365D4069feE4ba2d9CB3331B2b176e0a402cf900?network=mainnet)

### Visual Squad Credits
* **3D Elements**
    * The Busmuth Temple by [JGAP](https://twitter.com/jokersgotaposse)
    * The Green Aurora + glitches by [Porke](https://twitter.com/PorkeDesign)
    * Scene layout, Log creation, final render  + composition by [Metsa](https://twitter.com/madebymetsa)
* **2D Elements**
    * Audio wave form visual by [Ivana](https://twitter.com/ive77i)
    * Elektran Sigils by [Private Woman](https://twitter.com/privatewoman777)
    * Flatfile design by [Peace Node](https://twitter.com/peace_node)

### The Swarm Credits
* **Voice acting**
    * Dartimus voice: [Colt](https://twitter.com/coltontbrown) 
    * Godina voice: [Iara](https://twitter.com/yoda_wazgood) and [Fran](https://twitter.com/thisisfrances)
    * Cat voice: [Jack](https://twitter.com/jackintheway)
    * Alpha voice: [Alex](https://twitter.com/alexpurdymusic)
    * Grey voice: [Greydient](https://twitter.com/greydient_music)
* **Mixing**
    * Mix and Arrangement Master: [Conor](https://twitter.com/ConorDalton_GC)
    * Voice processing and mix arrangement support: [Greydient](https://twitter.com/greydient_music)
    * Mix support: [Max](https://twitter.com/drummaxd), Alex, [Fran](https://twitter.com/thisisfrances)
* **Writing**
    * Head Writer: Iara
    * Creative Directors: [Matthew](https://twitter.com/matthewchaim) and Max
    * Writers: [Sarah](https://twitter.com/sarahgrabman), Jack, Alex, [Will](https://twitter.com/thepmmirror)
* **Music**
    * Godina song: Iara
    * Capsule song: Fran
    * Log 3 NFT ending beat: Max
    * Log 3 cave scene beat: Alex
    * Music bed/ SFX: [Josh](https://twitter.com/JoshLippi), Conor, Iara, Fran, Greydient


**The first batch of songs out of Elektra drop on Monday August 16 at 4:30 PM ET ‚Üí [Add Event Reminder](https://www.addevent.com/event/XZ8020000)**

## Phase 2 of the Elektra project begins in September 2021 ‚Üí The Elektra DAO

**Dates:** Begin to establish during camp, with the first official ElektraDAO call on September 1 2021 
* Establish decentralized influence over the future of Elektra via the $ELEKTRA token
    * Develop Elektra‚Äôs tokenomics design and distribution to incentivize high-quality participation in the project through collective ownership and governance
    * Create a committee of camp participants + backers to continue developing the Elektra project
    * Initial proposed tokenonmics distribution ‚Üí August 9 2021
* Develop and execute on proposals that move the Elektra story, art and project forward
    * **EXPAND** ‚Äî increase the reach and distribution of the story and art we‚Äôve already created. Ideas: 
        * An ELEKTRA album release ‚Äî audio story + songs
        * A re-release of the Elektra interactive game that is gated by $ELEKTRA and/or Portal Tickets
        * Alternative web3 routes to distribution + monetization of the story and artwork
    * **ADVANCE** ‚Äî continue to develop future chapters of the Elektra story and world. Ideas:
        * Write Chapter 2 and onward of the Elektra story
        * Create more audio-visual pieces that tell that story
        * Create more levels to the Elektra interactive game
        * Create more songs for future chapters
        * Create a feature film :)
